issue.title: AdGuard family DNS is blocking access to `is-a.dev` and subdomains
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

(unrelated)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://is-a.dev and subdomains

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare DNS :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 1.1.1.1
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 237.200857ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 53708
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

With Google DNS (8.8.8.8) :+1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 8.8.8.8
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 136.851108ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19213
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A                                                 
;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```


With AdGuard Default (blocks ads + trackers) :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.14
dnslookup v1.9.1                                                           dnslookup result (elapsed 409.14004ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52383
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 156.634599ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 26887
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1183    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

AdGuard non-filtering (same result as for above default filtering one) :+1:

AdGuard Family :-1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 167.088819ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22995
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.16
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 198.463718ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31559
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35
```

Note that 68.65.123.44 is the good IP, 94.140.14.35 returns a site displaying that access to the site was denied (can't open in browser as Firefox refuses to open the page due to.SSL certificate errors). Raw HTML can be viewed with `curl -k`. **WARNING: `-k` WILL IGNORE ANY CERTIFICATE**
## Additional details

This issue was earlier reported here: https://github.com/is-a-dev/register/issues/6838

This issue was found as I was not able to connect to any of `*.is-a.dev` as well as `is-a.dev` on my phone. I use a VPN server running on localhost which disables ads by DNS injection (basically all ad sites are routed to 0.0.0.0, this disables ads on most sites improving my internet experience). This along with uBlock origin gives a really clean experience on my phone. A temporary workaround for me is to use CloudFlare or Google's DNS servers. This doesn't make any difference to me as I have a separate blocklist as well which disables ad sites as well as inappropriate sites which are not included by AdGuard DNS

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://consent.google.de/m?continue=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.de%2Fmaps%2Fpreview&gl=DE&m=0&pc=m&uxe=eomtm&cm=2&hl=de&src=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fconsent.google.de%2Fm%3Fcontinue%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.google.de%252Fmaps%252Fpreview%26gl%3DDE%26m%3D0%26pc%3Dm%26uxe%3Deomtm%26cm%3D2%26hl%3Dde%26src%3D1) ### Comment > Problem: Google consent (nag screen). Problem can be reproduced as follows: > > (1) Go to Google.de > (2) Enter "Google Maps" > (3) Choose the first result (google.de/maps/preview) > > The second search result (https://www.google.com/maps/?hl=de) takes me go Google Maps without a nag screen (no google consent nag screen), but the google consent nag screen pops up when you follow the first search result (google.de/maps/preview). The filter lists regarding google consent probably work flawlessly with google.com, but they do not seem to work with google.de. > ### Screenshots

AdGuard for iOS

4.4.6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

Safari

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www3.zoechip.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>I'm really worried that I did something wrong and that that's why no one was assigned to my last issue or responded. If i did something against the Adguard rules, please inform me! I am very sorry for whatever is i did. Am I on a temporary suspension? A permanent suspension? Is there anything I can do to appeal?

If anyone could please inform me it be very helpful because I actually pay for Adguard. I'm on the premium on my phone and well if i am suspended permanently or something and can't get any more technical support with your app, well i need to know so that I know it's nothing personal!
no hard feelings end my subscription and fine another adblock team that hopfully i wont have caused infractors with if i have caused any with you guys!

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www3.zoechip.com/movie/spirited-90331

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> Hi so im going on zoechip3.org to try and watch a movie and even with my adguard up to date, latest version, and Mobil ads filter and base filter it still has ads on the site that i annoyingly have to keep closing only to open pop us which i have to close of those and if you click on the site it opens pop up tabs 

you literally have to face a couple pop up tabs to finally be able to use the site any help to this would be very appreciative

comment.body: @olstice They use inline initial script. Sometimes it cannot be blocked stable on iOS. iOS does not have native support of advanced syntax, and our implementation is executed with a delay (~200 ms).

Не повторяется. Попробуйте обновить фильтры, очистить данные браузера, перезапустить его и открыть сайт.

> Почему программа регулярно выключается? Меня это не устраивает

Скорее всего ОС закрывает приложение, нужно дать необходимые разрешения программе. Если это не получается сделать самому, свяжитесь с support@adguard.com.

comment.body:
> the same happens when the AdBlock is disabled

Maybe you have another extensions that affect this site.

Reproduced blocked ad right now - audio was blocked. Not sure about autostart of the next track, used Next Track button.

<details>

issue.title: AdGuard family DNS is blocking access to `is-a.dev` and subdomains

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

(unrelated)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://is-a.dev and subdomains

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare DNS :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 1.1.1.1
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 237.200857ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 53708
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

With Google DNS (8.8.8.8) :+1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 8.8.8.8
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 136.851108ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19213
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A                                                 
;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```


With AdGuard Default (blocks ads + trackers) :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.14
dnslookup v1.9.1                                                           dnslookup result (elapsed 409.14004ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52383
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 156.634599ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 26887
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1183    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

AdGuard non-filtering (same result as for above default filtering one) :+1:

AdGuard Family :-1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 167.088819ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22995
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.16
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 198.463718ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31559
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35
```

Note that 68.65.123.44 is the good IP, 94.140.14.35 returns a site displaying that access to the site was denied (can't open in browser as Firefox refuses to open the page due to.SSL certificate errors). Raw HTML can be viewed with `curl -k`. **WARNING: `-k` WILL IGNORE ANY CERTIFICATE**
## Additional details

This issue was earlier reported here: https://github.com/is-a-dev/register/issues/6838

This issue was found as I was not able to connect to any of `*.is-a.dev` as well as `is-a.dev` on my phone. I use a VPN server running on localhost which disables ads by DNS injection (basically all ad sites are routed to 0.0.0.0, this disables ads on most sites improving my internet experience). This along with uBlock origin gives a really clean experience on my phone. A temporary workaround for me is to use CloudFlare or Google's DNS servers. This doesn't make any difference to me as I have a separate blocklist as well which disables ad sites as well as inappropriate sites which are not included by AdGuard DNS

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: AdGuard family DNS is blocking access to `is-a.dev` and subdomains

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

(unrelated)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://is-a.dev and subdomains

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare DNS :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 1.1.1.1
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 237.200857ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 53708
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

With Google DNS (8.8.8.8) :+1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 8.8.8.8
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 136.851108ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19213
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A                                                 
;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```


With AdGuard Default (blocks ads + trackers) :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.14
dnslookup v1.9.1                                                           dnslookup result (elapsed 409.14004ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52383
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 156.634599ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 26887
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1183    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

AdGuard non-filtering (same result as for above default filtering one) :+1:

AdGuard Family :-1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 167.088819ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22995
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.16
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 198.463718ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31559
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35
```

Note that 68.65.123.44 is the good IP, 94.140.14.35 returns a site displaying that access to the site was denied (can't open in browser as Firefox refuses to open the page due to.SSL certificate errors). Raw HTML can be viewed with `curl -k`. **WARNING: `-k` WILL IGNORE ANY CERTIFICATE**
## Additional details

This issue was earlier reported here: https://github.com/is-a-dev/register/issues/6838

This issue was found as I was not able to connect to any of `*.is-a.dev` as well as `is-a.dev` on my phone. I use a VPN server running on localhost which disables ads by DNS injection (basically all ad sites are routed to 0.0.0.0, this disables ads on most sites improving my internet experience). This along with uBlock origin gives a really clean experience on my phone. A temporary workaround for me is to use CloudFlare or Google's DNS servers. This doesn't make any difference to me as I have a separate blocklist as well which disables ad sites as well as inappropriate sites which are not included by AdGuard DNS

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Please use our private DNS server ( https://adguard-dns.io/en/welcome.html) and add the following rule in private DNS to user filter:

`@@||script.ioam.de^|`


Alternatively change your DNS server to e.g. Google and add above rule to DNS user filter.

Reason why we do not unblock that domain in our DNS server:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/pull/1442#issuecomment-1667636605

issue.title: AdGuard family DNS is blocking access to `is-a.dev` and subdomains

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

(unrelated)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://is-a.dev and subdomains

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare DNS :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 1.1.1.1
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 237.200857ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 53708
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

With Google DNS (8.8.8.8) :+1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 8.8.8.8
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 136.851108ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19213
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A                                                 
;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```


With AdGuard Default (blocks ads + trackers) :+1:
```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.14
dnslookup v1.9.1                                                           dnslookup result (elapsed 409.14004ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52383
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1200    IN      A       68.65.123.44

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 156.634599ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 26887
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       1183    IN      A       68.65.123.44
```

AdGuard non-filtering (same result as for above default filtering one) :+1:

AdGuard Family :-1:

```
$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.14.15
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 167.088819ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22995
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35

$ dnslookup is-a.dev 94.140.15.16
dnslookup v1.9.1
dnslookup result (elapsed 198.463718ms):
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31559
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;is-a.dev.      IN       A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
is-a.dev.       3600    IN      A       94.140.14.35
```

Note that 68.65.123.44 is the good IP, 94.140.14.35 returns a site displaying that access to the site was denied (can't open in browser as Firefox refuses to open the page due to.SSL certificate errors). Raw HTML can be viewed with `curl -k`. **WARNING: `-k` WILL IGNORE ANY CERTIFICATE**
## Additional details

This issue was earlier reported here: https://github.com/is-a-dev/register/issues/6838

This issue was found as I was not able to connect to any of `*.is-a.dev` as well as `is-a.dev` on my phone. I use a VPN server running on localhost which disables ads by DNS injection (basically all ad sites are routed to 0.0.0.0, this disables ads on most sites improving my internet experience). This along with uBlock origin gives a really clean experience on my phone. A temporary workaround for me is to use CloudFlare or Google's DNS servers. This doesn't make any difference to me as I have a separate blocklist as well which disables ad sites as well as inappropriate sites which are not included by AdGuard DNS

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: There are no separate block lists for parental controls or phishing. But we have tracking and advertising [blocklist](https://adguardteam.github.io/AdGuardSDNSFilter/Filters/filter.txt)

To check that domains are allowed, navigate AdGuard for Android -> 보호 -> 광고 차단 -> 사용자 규칙
To check that Naver Cafe app is not filtered by AdGuard for Android, navigate AdGuard for Android -> 앱 관리 -> 네이버 카페

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
